metadata.title: CVE-2019-12106 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The updateDevice function in minissdpd.c in MiniUPnP MiniSSDPd 1.4 and 1.5allows a remote attacker to crash the process due to a Use After Freevulnerability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-12106` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

minissdpd - 1.2.20130907-3+deb8u2build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: minissdpd package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.20130907-3+deb8u2build0.16.04.1').
